name: European Guide Dog Federation
goal:
Helping guide dog schools and user organisations across Europe
Campaigning for access and against discrimination
Helping to set a European standard for assistance dogs
Carrying out appropriate research. See our website: www.egdfed.org
interests: Communication, Consumer Affairs, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Fisheries and Aquaculture, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
UNCRPD
Equality Acts and anti-discrimination legislation
Sustainable Development Goals
All European standards through our membership of ANEC and our participation in CEN TC 452
